adjective.description: Of or denoting a gender of nouns in some languages, typically contrasting with masculine and feminine or common.
examples: it is a neuter word in Greek

adjective.description: (of an animal) lacking developed sexual organs, or having had them removed.

noun.description: A nonfertile caste of social insect, especially a worker bee or ant.

origin: Late Middle English: via Old French from Latin neuter neither, from ne- not + uter either.
